Chatter

Jun 2016

Overview

Development Node JS, Socket.IO, Say.js, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS3
Team size Solo
Category Personal Project

Project description

Inspired by Discord, I created a chatroom service that implements text-to-speech (TTS) functionality. My main goal for this project was to familiarize myself with the Node JS framework, but I might return to add more features in the future.

Responsibilities

  • Designed CSS styling and html layout
  • Implemented chat and storage functionality
  • Forked Say.js repository, added bugfix for stopping TTS on Windows
